item.description:
Let's go see Contagion! It has good reviews.

We'll have lunch first @ Vapiano. It is a casual Italian eatery. You get your own "chip card". You go around with a tray, flash your chip card when you place your order and they give you a buzzer and buzz you when your food is done.  Everyone pays their own bill at the end. They have pizzas, pastas, sandwiches, salads, etc. After lunch it's a short walk to the theatre.

We suggest you get your movie ticket before lunch or online (fandango). We plan to see the 3:00 pm showing. Or you can go right after lunch to purchase them.

Vapiano is at 191 Stuart St. Boston. It is part of the State Transportation building. The closest T stop is Boylston St. on the Green line.

 

 

 

.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the downstairs lobby.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch & Movie downtown - Saturday
